segments.text: The boy on the stool is reaching for cookies, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised he hasn't fallen yet, the stool looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is waiting patiently for a cookie, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit envious of their bravery and mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is getting closer to them, but they don't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't slip and hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost within the boy's reach, he's so determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed any of this yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is like a ticking time bomb, waiting for something to go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they'll get away with the cookies, but at what cost?
segments.speaker: PAR
